```py
>>> df = pd.DataFrame({'num_legs': [2, 4], 'num_wings': [2, 0]},
...                   index=['falcon', 'dog'])
>>> df
 num_legs  num_wings
falcon         2          2
dog            4          0 
```

```py
>>> df.isin([0, 2])
 num_legs  num_wings
falcon      True       True
dog        False       True 
```

```py
>>> ~df.isin([0, 2])
 num_legs  num_wings
falcon     False      False
dog         True      False 
```

```py
>>> df.isin({'num_wings': [0, 3]})
 num_legs  num_wings
falcon     False      False
dog        False       True 
```

```py
>>> other = pd.DataFrame({'num_legs': [8, 3], 'num_wings': [0, 2]},
...                      index=['spider', 'falcon'])
>>> df.isin(other)
 num_legs  num_wings
falcon     False       True
dog        False      False 
```
